decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 3 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans 840_(PL)01; 840_(PL)02; 840_(PL)03; 840_(PL)04; 840_(PL)05; 840_(PL)06 REVA; 840_(PL)07; 840_(PL)08 REVA; 840_(PL)15 REVA; 840_(PL)16 REVA; 840_(PL)17 REVA; 840_(PL)18 REVA; 840_(PL)20 REVA; 840_(PL)21 REVA; 840_(PL)22 REVA and 840_(PL) 23 REVA.

Reason:
For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 4 - Before the relevant part of the work is begun, detailed drawings, or samples of materials as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority: 

a) Details including -	Plans, elevations and sections drawings of the conservatory at an appropriate scale with moulding details at 1:1;

b) Plans, elevations and sections drawings of the spiral stair at an appropriate scale with moulding details at 1:1.0; 

c) Plans, sections and elevations of the new door, with a window arch, proposed at ground floor level at a scale of 1:5 with moulding details at 1:1, and;

d) Plans, elevations and section drawings of the new windows and new door at a scale of 1:5 with moulding details at 1:1.  

The relevant part of the works shall be carried out in accordance with the details thus approved and all approved samples shall be retained on site during the course of the works. 

Reason:  To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
description: Alteration to the fenestration and faï¿½ade treatment to the front and rear elevations at all levels, including roof and windows replacement, replacement of the existing window with door and installation of spiral staircase to the rear between the ground and first floors, demolition of the existing to the rear conservatory and erection of single storey extension within the same footprint.
